snippet: “Joan Miró,” with 160 or so works from 1917 to 1974, is a beautiful and exciting show at the National Gallery of Art.
abstract: Ken Johnson reviews exhibit Joan Miro: The Ladder of Escape at the National Gallery of Art.
lead_paragraph: “Joan Miró,” with 160 or so works from 1917 to 1974, is a beautiful and exciting show at the National Gallery of Art.

headline.seo: ‘Joan Miró: The Ladder of Escape,’ at National Gallery
headline.main: Filtering Miró’s Work Through a Political Sieve
